name: My Cabin
description:
Controls:

  • mouse left click = Draw/ Select item from menu
  • CTRL + mouse left click = Draw/Select  Multiple items from menu
  • E + mouse left click  = Delete
  • CTRL + mouse scroll wheel = Paint/Erase radius
    • (up/down  for WEB version)
  • mouse scroll wheel = Zoom
  • mouse right click = Scene Pan
  • 7-9 = paint speed

Draw your dream cabin landscape!

Would love to see what you create, share your creations in the comments, Thanks!
